commands: if command -v yum >/dev/null 2>&1; then yum install -y zip; elif command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then apt-get update && apt-get install -y zip; else echo "No supported package manager found. Install zip manually."; fi
aws lambda update-function-code --function-name demo --zip-file fileb://code.zip > update-output.log 2>&1
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Update function code failed"; cat update-output.log; exit 1; fi
aws lambda publish-version --function-name demo --description "Automated version update" > publish-output.log 2>&1
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Publish version failed"; cat publish-output.log; exit 1; fi
